inclusion.criterion: consecutive patients entering the emergency department for possible acute biliary pancreatitis
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: all consecutive patients entering the emergency department for possible acute biliary pancreatitis
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: patient in whom the cause of biliary obstruction was already identified by US
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: 54-year-old obese woman with abdominal pain, nausea and vomiting. Ultrasound revealed gallstones, biliary sludge and CBD stones.
